encode y-flip + 4 rotations as an integer

ExtendToIsomers 
 public ShapeNormalizer[] ExtendToIsomers()
extend a single shape to a list of ShapeNormalizers, one for each distinct isomer of the parent shape. Each normalizer contains an array of points which correspond to the local picture of the shape, but importantly, the list is in the same order as the original, so the ordinal "play here" values contained in SingleResult objects we eventually find will refer to the correct points.

FindSimilarIsomer 
 ShapeNormalizer FindSimilarIsomer(OneShape other)
